CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Capacity_Target__c) || Capacity_Target__c = 0, null, CASE( Market_Unit__c, "DFJ_DK", Realistic_Capacity_Booked__c / Capacity_Target__c, "Testamente_DK", Realistic_Capacity_Booked__c / Capacity_Target__c, "FA_SE", Capacity_Booked__c / Capacity_Target__c, "Testamente_SV", Capacity_Booked__c / Capacity_Target__c, Realistic_Capacity_Booked__c / Capacity_Target__c ) )
CustomField.label: Capacity Index
